data.title: Obituary for Mary Ellen Neal

data.meta_description: Mary Neal | October 15, 2021 & Fairview Heights, IL | Mary Ellen Neal, nee Fink, age... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Mary Ellen Neal | Kassly Mortuary
data.text:
Mary Ellen Neal, nee Fink, age 69, of Fairview Heights, IL, born on February 10, 1952, in East St. Louis, IL, died on Friday, October 15, 2021, at St. Elizabeth Hospital, Oâ€™Fallon, IL.

Mary Ellen began her career as a legal secretary and worked for the City of Fairview Heights for over 25 years in the Land Use and Development Department. She regularly volunteered at St Albert the Great School and was proud to be the Leader of Girl Scout Troop 747. Mary Ellen loved adventures with her family and was a passionate genealogist and animal advocate. In her spare time, she loved gardening, photography, and spending time with her grandchildren.

She was preceded in death by her husband, Michael Neal; a grandson Isaac Humphreys; her parents Lamar H. and Bernice E. (nee, Robinson) Fink.

Mary is survived by her children; Kelly (Tom) Neal Kowalski, Kathy (Jason) Neal Humphreys, and Patrick (Maggie) Neal; her grandchildren, Luke Neal, Katie Neal, Eleanor Humphreys, Hayley Neal, Allison Neal, Joseph Humphreys, and Danielle Humphreys; and many friends.

Memorials may be made to the David C. Pratt Cancer Center.

Condolences may be expressed to the family online at www.kasslyfuneral.com.

Visitation will be held on Wednesday, October 20, 2021, from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. a.m. at Kassly Mortuary, Ltd., Fairview Heights, IL.

Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Thursday, October 21, 2021, at 11:00 a.m. at Holy Trinity Catholic Church, Fairview Heights, IL with Father James Nall officiating. Interment will be held in Mount Carmel Cemetery, Belleville, IL.
